verses.text: \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w steward|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* corn, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H6310"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w hold|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w top|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sack|strong="H0572"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* younger’s \w sack|strong="H0572"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w price|strong="H3701"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wheat. \w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* arose, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* asses.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H0310"\w* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w forward|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* little \w way|strong="H5921"\w*; \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* sending \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w steward|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w overtaken|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* returned \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*?

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w cup|strong="H1931"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* stolen \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* drinketh, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0834"\w* divine: \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* did \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H1697"\w* having \w overtaken|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* though thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w had|strong="H5650"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* heinous \w a|strong="H1696"\w* fact?

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w top|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H0834"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w then|strong="H7725"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w lord’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*?

\w With|strong="H0854"\w* whomsoever \w of|strong="H5650"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou seekest, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* bondmen \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*: \w Let|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* sentence: \w with|strong="H0854"\w* whomsoever \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* blameless.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* speedily \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w their|strong="H3381"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w sack|strong="H0572"\w*.

Which \w when|strong="H3615"\w* \w he|strong="H1144"\w* \w had|strong="H4672"\w* \w searched|strong="H2664"\w*, \w beginning|strong="H2490"\w* \w at|strong="H1144"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* eldest \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w ending|strong="H3615"\w* \w at|strong="H1144"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w*, \w he|strong="H1144"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w Benjamin’s|strong="H1144"\w* \w sack|strong="H0572"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* rent \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H8071"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w loading|strong="H6006"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* asses \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Juda \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, (\w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w*), \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* altogether \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*? \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* science \w of|strong="H0376"\w* divining.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Juda \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*? \w or|strong="H1571"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w or|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* justly \w to|strong="H0559"\w* allege? \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H1571"\w* bondmen \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Joseph|strong="H3027"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* stole \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* bondman: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* free \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* Juda \w coming|strong="H5066"\w* nearer, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* boldly: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao thou art,

\w My|strong="H5650"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*. Thou didst \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first time: \w Have|strong="H0001"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w we|strong="H0905"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*: \w We|strong="H0905"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w a|strong="H3426"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w a|strong="H3426"\w* \w young|strong="H3206"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* born \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w age|strong="H2208"\w*; \w whose|strong="H0251"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* loveth \w him|strong="H0413"\w* tenderly.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* thou saidst \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* hither \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3201"\w* suggested \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* if \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* thou saidst \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w Except|strong="H0518"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w*, \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H7725"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* wheat.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* set \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w together|strong="H0854"\w*: \w otherwise|strong="H3808"\w*, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* dare \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

Whereunto \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H7200"\w* beast devoured \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* hitherto \w he|strong="H5704"\w* appeareth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.
